docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., June 3 -- Adlai E. Stevenson will fly to Caracas, Venezuela, tomorrow to begin an eighteen-day tour of all ten South American capitals.

docs.abstract: tour set; Latin Amer officials help arrange it; Amb Briggs, Prof L Gordon, other members of party listed; itinerary

docs.snippet: THE recent military coup in Korea was undoubtedly upsetting for most Americans, who tend to think of our allies as democratic states, not military dictatorships. Indeed, much of the justification for the aid. technical training and arms which the...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE recent military coup in Korea was undoubtedly upsetting for most Americans, who tend to think of our allies as democratic states, not military dictatorships. Indeed, much of the justification for the aid. technical training and arms which the United States gives to the newly independent states of Africa and Asia stems from the belief that democracy will eventually triumph around the world.

docs.snippet: CIUDAD TRUJILLO, Dominican Republic, June 4 -- President Joaquin Balaguer said today that a formula for "certifying" electoral practices throughout the Western Hemisphere might be "a basis for discussion" to bring the Dominican Republic back into the...
docs.lead_paragraph: CIUDAD TRUJILLO, Dominican Republic, June 4 -- President Joaquin Balaguer said today that a formula for "certifying" electoral practices throughout the Western Hemisphere might be "a basis for discussion" to bring the Dominican Republic back into the inter-American family.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, June 5 -- The Organization of American States decided tonight to send a special fact-finding mission to the Dominican Republic. It will investigate charges of police terror and brutality following the assassination last week of...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 5 -- The Organization of American States decided tonight to send a special fact-finding mission to the Dominican Republic. It will investigate charges of police terror and brutality following the assassination last week of Generalissimo Rafael Leonidas Trujillo Molina.
docs.abstract: OAS decides to send mission to probe charges of terrorism; ex-Amb Drew to be US member; decision linked with Min Herrera Baez visit to Washington to conf with OAS com; illus; US high officials meetings on situation noted
